title: Officer Fatally Shoots Cleveland Boy Brandishing Fake Gun
teaser: Over the weekend in Ohio, a Cleveland police officer shot and killed a 12-year-old boy who was carrying an air pistol. It's not the first such death in the city in recent years, and it sparked a number of peaceful protests.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
